title: How to Make Feta Cheese Patties

steps.headline: In a large bowl, stir the flour, the baking powder and the salt.
Pour the sunflower oil and continue stirring.
When all the mixture is wet, add the margarine and the beaten egg and  knead them.
In a cup, stir the milk and the dry yeast for 1-2 minutes and then add them to the dough.
Knead until the dough doesn't stick in the hands and can be rolled.
Roll out the dough to a medium-thick sheet.
Use a glass to cut it out, forming small circles.
In every circle, add 1 teaspoon filling or more, if the pieces are big.
Fold the circle like the shape of a half-moon.
Press gently the edges with a spoon, to stick well together.
Bake them on a baking paper in 185ºC (350ºF) for about 25 minutes, until their color becomes golden brown.

text: Making the Dough In a large bowl, stir the flour, the baking powder and the salt.  Pour the sunflower oil and continue stirring.  When all the mixture is wet, add the margarine and the beaten egg and  knead them.  In a cup, stir the milk and the dry yeast for 1-2 minutes and then add them to the dough.  Knead until the dough doesn't stick in the hands and can be rolled.  Adding Filling to the Patties Roll out the dough to a medium-thick sheet.  Use a glass to cut it out, forming small circles.  In every circle, add 1 teaspoon filling or more, if the pieces are big.  Fold the circle like the shape of a half-moon.  Press gently the edges with a spoon, to stick well together.  Bake them on a baking paper in 185ºC (350ºF) for about 25 minutes, until their color becomes golden brown.  Finished.
